title: Robin Nicholas
content:
Head of Typography for [Monotype Imaging Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809033611/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype%20Imaging%20Inc.) in Salfords, England

Born 1947, in Westerham, Kent, England

His type designs include Arial, Bembo Book, Clarion, Fairbank MT, Felbridge, Nimrod and Plantin

[bio and type designs at MTI's website](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809033611/http:/www.monotypeimaging.com/ProductsServices/TypeDesignerShowcase/RobinNicholas/)
